C

com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app - package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app
This package serves as a simple extension to familiar Android APIs, designed to make the implementation of a "full" Metro UI much easier.

setActivityAnimation(Animation, Animation) - Method in class com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app.WPActivity
Define custom animations to be used during Activity transitions such as an Activity being finished.
setActivityInAnimation(Animation) - Method in class com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app.WPActivity
Set the animation to be used when an Activity transitions in, such as the next Activity finishing.

Note: This method is provided to allow for overriding a previous set activity animation.

Set the animation to be used when an Activity transitions out, such as this Activity finishing or another Activity being started.

Note: This method is provided to allow for overriding a previous set activity animation.
